pages.text: Powder Power allows you to create new alloys from existing Minecraft materials like Redstone, Lapis, Iron, Gold, Diamond, etc. There are (4) new alloys to make that have stats beyond diamond. It lets you get the most out of what is already in Minecraft..$(li)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/powder-power)Curseforge page$(/l) lots of information.$(li)$(l:https://discord.gg/j7bYbkW)Discord$(/l)$()$(br)The following pages show material progression.
